page.title: 18My Hobbies in Kirkby
page.content: My name is Paul Grimes and I go to Park Brow Junior School. When I am not going to school I like to go to the Community Centre. Sometimes I play Pool but the thing I like to do best is 'Break-Dancing'. 'Break-Dancing' or 'Body- Popping' started in America and it is a bit like dancing but with Gymnastics as well. I can do the 'Caterpillar' which means you slide along the floor in time to the music. My favourite record for 'Break-Dancing' is by Frank Franmeyer with Axel-F (they are his backing group).
